intro: Microstylis oligantha, commonly known as the slender-styled microstylis, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Poaceae, commonly known as grasses. It is characterized by its small, delicate inflorescences and narrow, grass-like leaves. The plant typically grows in moist, open habitats such as wetlands and marshes. Its flowers are usually inconspicuous, with reduced floral structures typical of many grasses. Microstylis oligantha is often found in tropical and subtropical regions, where it plays a minor role in local ecosystems.
